analyzed: gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags /
translated: It is through not apprehending anything that they emerge in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “It is through the way in which inner emptiness is not apprehended, through the way in which outer emptiness is not apprehended, through the way in which inner and outer emptiness is not apprehended, through the way in which the emptiness of emptiness is not apprehended,

original: chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: through the way in which great emptiness is not apprehended, through the way in which ultimate emptiness is not apprehended, through the way in which conditioned emptiness is not apprehended, through the way in which unconditioned emptiness is not apprehended, and through the way in which the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is not apprehended.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /🔽rang gi mtshan @295b nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan @295b nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness that is the nonapprehension of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless, the emptiness that is the nonapprehension of the emptiness of nonrepudiation, the emptiness that is the nonapprehension of the emptiness of nature, the emptiness that is the nonapprehension of the emptiness of all phenomena,🔽the emptiness that is the nonapprehension of the emptiness of its own mark, the emptiness that is the nonapprehension of the emptiness of nonexistence, the emptiness that is the nonapprehension of the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o //
translated: and the emptiness that is the nonapprehension of the emptiness of the nonexistence of own-being.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /

original: le'u drug pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u drug pa'o ////

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na /

analyzed: de skad ces 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi /bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing /

analyzed: ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di; bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
translated: ‘Does this illusory person train in the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration and emerge in omniscience?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na; bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na; bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: brda med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang /
translated: It is without signs, without designations, without conventions, without names, without the designation of names, without a body, without physical action, without speech, without verbal action,

original: yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de @318a *//
analyzed: yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de @318a *//

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
translated: “Lord, if all phenomena are like this, do bodhisattva great beings train in the perfection of wisdom and emerge in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram /🔽gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //

translated: In this way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being, having trained in the perfection of wisdom, through the method of nonapprehending, will emerge into the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //

translated: because of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, it is non-apprehensible;

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so; ;rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so; ;rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of non-dispersal, it is non-apprehensible; because of the emptiness of inherent existence, it is non-apprehensible;

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of all things, it is non-apprehensible;

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of inherent characteristics, it is non-apprehensible;

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of non-apprehension, it is non-apprehensible;🔽because of the emptiness of non-entities, it is non-apprehensible;

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of essential nature, it is non-apprehensible;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: rab 'byor / @322a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / @322a *//
translated: Subhūti,

original: gzugs ni / smig rgyu lta bu /🔽tshor ba ni /
analyzed: gzugs ni / smig rgyu lta bu / tshor ba ni /
translated: form is like a mirage,

original: smig rgyu lta bu /🔽'du shes ni /
analyzed: smig rgyu lta bu / 'du shes ni /
translated: feeling is like a mirage,

original: smig rgyu lta bu /🔽'du byed ni /
analyzed: smig rgyu lta bu / 'du byed ni /
translated: perception is like a mirage,

original: smig rgyu lta bu /🔽rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: smig rgyu lta bu / rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: volitional factors are like a mirage,

original: smig rgyu lta bu ste /
analyzed: smig rgyu lta bu ste /
translated: and consciousness is like a mirage.

original: rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is consciousness

original: dbang po drug go /
analyzed: dbang po drug go /
translated: is the six sense faculties.

original: de ni / phung po lnga'o //
analyzed: de ni / phung po lnga'o //
translated: That is the five aggregates.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: Those

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //🔽phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so // phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: are not apprehended because of inner emptiness,🔽are not apprehended because of outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: are not apprehended because of inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: are not apprehended because of the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: are not apprehended because of great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: are not apprehended because of ultimate emptiness,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: are not apprehended because of conditioned emptiness,🔽and

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of the unconditioned, they are non-apprehensible;

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of the unlimited, they are non-apprehensible;🔽because of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, they are non-apprehensible;

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of non-rejection, they are non-apprehensible;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of inherent existence, they are non-apprehensible;

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of all things, they are non-apprehensible;

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, they are non-apprehensible;

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of non-apprehension, they are non-apprehensible;🔽because of the emptiness of non-entities, they are non-apprehensible;

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of essential nature, they are non-apprehensible;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: and because of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, they are non-apprehensible.
